body_html:
You don't have that many rows to be fair, you do have a big batch dimension, however.

Try maybe (20,10**6), so 20 batches a 1 million rows. The GPU topk implementation launches one thread block per batch, so with the original (10**6,20), it will perform a topk on 20 elements over a 1 million batches. Probably not what you want. (Or at least I don't think that is the general use-case).

Thanks,
Andreas

body:
You don't have that many rows to be fair, you do have a big batch dimension, however.

Try maybe `(20,10**6)`, so 20 batches a 1 million rows. The GPU topk implementation launches one thread block per batch, so with the original `(10**6,20)`, it will perform a topk on 20 elements over a 1 million batches. Probably not what you want. (Or at least I don't think that is the general use-case).

Thanks,
 Andreas
